subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a year and a half out of baseball, Rick Peterson, the former Met’s pitching coach, is revamping a Brewers pitching staff that compiled a 5.37 earned run average last year.
snippet: After a year and a half out of baseball, Rick Peterson, the former Met’s pitching coach, is revamping a Brewers pitching staff that compiled a 5.37 earned run average last year.
